name: Amethyst
description: Light bounces between the crystals, to make the Amethyst shine even brighter.
detail: Purple currency. Buy things in the shop with them.

name: Gushing Granny
detail: Reverses the effect of Lean. Can be used on yourself or others.

name: Conduit
detail: When applied, the Conduit activates and blocks the effect of Lean. 30% chance of failure and destruction every time it is activated.
